sentences.english: He is a strangespecimenin our school.
sentences.chinese: 他在我們學校是一個瑰異的人。

sentences.english: Thereas little wonder why young people often find it difficult to find a fitting role model .
sentences.chinese: 年輕人呈現很難找到合適的範例並不瑰異。

sentences.english: We could see very clearly an odd light well seemfore us.
sentences.chinese: 我們清楚地看到後面有瑰異的光。

sentences.english: The opera tonight was magnificent and enchanting.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的歌劇演出華麗瑰異，引人入勝。
